resources.string: Tap to check between 24 hour or 12 hour
Choose from a variety of themes
Swipe left/right to remove an app or long press to drag up/down to reorder

"Slim v2.1.0 © 2018
" Created by : Beautus S Gumede
 Source : https://github.com/sduduzog/slim-launcher

 Slim is an open source application launcher created to be a minimal and simple launcher to help users spend less time on their phones. Obviously the less you use your phone, the more time spent living life as it was intended.

 The moment you ask questions like "Why can't I add more than 5 apps on this launcher?" Well that's the whole point! Do you really NEED and USE more that 5 apps on your phone? EVERYDAY?

 Anyways rate the app on google play and leave feedback or drop me an email at gumedesduduzo@gmail.com

 Become a tester and receive the latest updates of the unreleased version of the app.

 3rd party credits/licences

"Lets get you set up!\n Just a few tweaks and your new home screen will be ready for you."
1. To open Slim options, click the arrow or swipe upwards from it.
3. Press the camera icon to launch the default camera app
2. Press the dialer icon to open the default dialer
2. Press the dialer icon to open the built-in dialer(experimental). Press and hold, open the default

"This is what your home screen will look like.

" "You should pick five of the apps you use the most.

" "You can later change them in Preferences."
This is also changeable in preferences. Whether you prefer a 12hr clock type or a 24hr clock type
